text: Hi HubSpot developers! Can someone direct me to the right channel for getting my custom integration approved without having it listed for other users to use? The integration is tightly coupled with our existing codebase, so other users wouldnt have any use for my integration and I'm not sure how to get approved in this case
Hey <@U01S2SG7ZQ8>!  No need to get it approved especially if it is for your own use!
